- Moved SID from entry task to main task
- Added delete option
- Added menu bar for screen mode
-DebtNoSource: 1 = Client, 2 = Heller
-ScreenMode: S = Screen (1 inv/screen), L = line (multiple inv/screen)
-The conditions for showing error indication borders in screen mode
are reused in the field color expression of the corresponding fields
in line mode by use of the expcalc function.
SIDs (in relevant tasks)
OSP001CS: Main screen Screen Mode (single invoice per screen)
OSP001CL: Main screen Line Mode (multiple invoices per screen)
OSP001CT: Term Details (relevant in Line Mode only)
OSP001CC: CCRY defaults subscreen
Initialization values for new records
Range variables for showing invalid entries
Date limits
mgwm control WinMgr/Text viewer
Result BSP012 check
temp fields for debtor search
For task called at the end (if OSP001C is closed and there exists a row in TEMP_INTERCREDIT)
Initial values for new debtor
Debtor numbers for BDC005
Check result DEBC existence pre BDH006
Button labels
Set keyboard mapping to RDE for line mode
hardcoding windows dir separator should not be a problem in online program
Reset keyboard mapping to normal
-- If OSP001C is closed and there exists a row in TEMP_INTERCREDIT
Call batch if Schedule OK
If batch is called close OSP001B (prevent locking SCHT record)
Screen mode continues with OK ('S'), Line mode simply returns online ('O')
In line mode close window manager to prevent confusion
on return validate row
08.08.2005 validation and booking
Disable TS booking... if schedule can be booked it will be done by BSP012
BSP012 to handle final checks + start of booking
Any result other than 3 (change not allowed due to validation)
should exit this program and its parent
In case of validation failure return to online screen
on return validate row
search using ODC001 pretends to be payment (i.e. uses same options)
manual schedule, existing DEBC but non existing SCHI then create w. defaults
If (DEBC_DEBC = '0') and client numbers are entered update DEBC_DEBC
..unless there is a debtor which would match the entered number
this may result in no update allowed so has to be checked first
18.12.2006 SH SCR12138 Added new test. incl. update of DHIC
Tax numbers always debn_entered = debh, debtor_id = DHIC_ID
Only change if ID found on debtor but not found with id from file on same debtor
Entering DEBH or entered = DEBC_DEBC, use selected Debtor
If DEBC_DEBC entered and DEBC_DEBC<>SCHI_DEBN_ENTERED
ask user if DEBC)_DEBC should be overwrtitten
Modification => validation thus set error
No row found but search numbers returned
Modification => validation thus set error
Another row for selected DEBH exists with SCHI_DEBN_ENTERED
allow user to use this
18.12.2006 SH SCR12138 Added new test. incl. update of DHIC
Modification => validation thus set error
No row for DEBH with SCHI_DEBN_ENTERED call ODC005
Use selected debtor
Set defaults for new rows
Set control fields
Locking the SCHT-record while it's SCHI-records are being edited
should not be a problem
O:Online entry
05.05.2003 JJ In case SCHT_AUTOMATIC = 'Y' only screen mode allowed (1 inv/scr)
01.09.2003 Manual schedules allow insert after debtor search
S:Save/OK, check, save and return online even if not OK
P:(1rec/scrn) same operations but continue with previous invoice if OK
Only validate if user is allowed to modify
Recalculate booked schedule totals
If any Errors: SP0014
O: OK= Return online to correct invoice
C: Cancel = Save and continue with next invoice
End validate when modifiable
Screen mode only:
Proceed with next line unless in error and MsgBoxRet(SP0020) <> 'C'
Next line not found, not in "errors only" and not "automatic"
Fetch prev.
End Save/Ok
V:Validate/ScheduleOK, Validate complete schedule
08.08.2005 JJ now handled by BSP012, old handling disabled
Recalculate and check totals
Error messages.
SP0010,SP0011,SP0012,SP0013 in case of differences in currency totals
SP0014 If any invoices are in error (count>0)
If all checks pass Set book flag and Journal number
SP0040 to inform user of assigned journal no
If there are no errors: set entry finished and Exit
If there are errors return Online (line 1)
End Validate
L: Validate One line
Recalculate and check totals
C: Cancel
W: View call OSP004C (disable "edit" functions)
N: New
Set current line to next new line
F: Find debtor
U: Update debtor
A: No nAme detAils
Record ID
Display only in screen mode
Debtor Identification Number+Zip
When using the search button the next fields up to and including
v.PrevDebtorNrEntered should be updated according to the selection
This way manual entry (i.e. not using search) can be distinguished
06.05.2003 terms not modifiable for client files
Term details as per TermCode, Modifiable if TermCode=0
06.05.2003 tems not modifiable for client files
Mark Code
Call search screen Debtor
Call overview all invoices of selected schedule (close current screen)
Call STCY overview as Subscreen
Check whole schedule and close if ok
View errors (if any)
Save changes, check and continue with next
Error Display
Invoice no in error if empty only, warn about duplicates
Only check for existence
Dummy Selects for create
Set records is still needed in this program to allow background color
change for fields which are in error
Changes of any field that is to be converted "on the fly" have to
trigger User action 1: (now in control suffix handling)
Init of AllowAutoUpdate prevents triggering AutoUpdate event during
record initialization
Screen mode, open text viewer
v.Prev_DEBN_ENTERED and v.Prev_Zip are used to check manual changes of
the debtor identification (i.e. not using Search-button)
Errors are only shown for records which have been checked and for
which INVERROR='Y'

in line mode transaltion fetched in task "view errors"

format and in case of error also the message text, only in screen mode
Valuedate null, manualterms value date = invoice date
In case term code + invoice date from init calculate due/value date
01.09.2003 also need to calculate due date if
-screen mode, manual schedule
-invoice + value date entered but duedate = null
-Netdays , extradays, or transfer days <>0 or EOM -= Y
Check for changes in reals
If debtor number or zipcode was changed manually the Heller and Client
Numbers should be reset and updated through the check program in case
of multiple matching debtor records.
Changes in debtor or invoice number invalidate duplication check
Check for non-debtor changes
Fields before markcode
Fields after markcode
Check for changes in debtor zip/number adress if not provided by client
If anything was changed except for debtor set manual change flag
If anything has been changed set SCHI_INVERROR = 'Y' until validation
proves otherwise (SP0033)
invoice and/or valuedate modified/recalc resulting in valuedate<invdate => error
If an invoice is modified check immediately unless deleted or searching debtor
Change in amount, currency or delete status => update STCY
Book off old value in modify mode (logical delete = modify)
Book in new value, if not deleted
... removed any leading/trainling blanks
... removed any leading/trainling blanks
Next field to take us over duedate
No nAme DetAils

ExpSyntax.val: {1,60}='NL' AND NOT (ISNULL ({0,38}) OR ISNULL ({0,24})) AND (VarMod ('{0,38}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,24}'VAR)) AND {0,38}<{0,24}
IF ({6,10}='Y' AND NOT (InStr ('AY',{6,15})>0 AND {1,65}<>'Y') OR InStr ({1,40},'M')=0,'E'MODE,CASE ({1,3},'M','M'MODE,'C','C'MODE,'E'MODE))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1 where ARCH_SCHT_NO = :2 AND ARCH_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME = 'HASA' AND ARCH_DOCTYPE = 277 AND ARCH_DATEDELETED IS NULL

Text.val: set search parameters
set init if a new debor is to be created
>>Buttons of parent (line mode)
This block moves the user to the next line in the parent task when
validation a single record after modification. must be placed here to
take effect.
NO buttons of parent, this is an entry sub screen even though it has no buttons
Separate modification check WKA from rest of pay terms

05.03.2002 JJ RS forced if no selection OK/Cancel (Toolbar/Esc/Enter)
Invoice date modified
If no termcode entered reset terms
Termcode change OR InvoiceDate change with termcode
payment terms
perform line validation fo line mode or OK for screen mode
.. unless we're to update the debtor first
perform line validation fo line mode or OK for screen mode
.. unless we're to update the debtor first

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({0,1}='H',MlsTrans ('Match on Heller debtor number'),MlsTrans ('Match on Client debtor number'))

Text.val: 18.12.2006 SH SCR12138 Added new test. incl. update of DHIC
If entereing debtor heller numbers or DEBC_DEBC matches use as is
Ask user to update DEBC only if entering DEBC_DEBC
If yes update DEBC with entered number
Else use debtor number form DEBC
If SCHI_ZIP doesn't match any zip set SCHI_ZIP to first non-empty zip
payment terms
perform line validation fo line mode or OK for screen mode
perform line validation fo line mode or OK for screen mode
18.12.2006 SH SCR12138 Added new test. incl. update of DHIC
01.02.2005 JJ Selection w. tax no: entered = DEBH, debrtor_id = dhic_id
Check SCHI_DEBTOR_ID; no error handling, some GB055 output parameters
are only used for display in "File details" in case of screen modus
If SCHI_ZIP doesn't match any zip set SCHI_ZIP to first non-empty zip
raise delete event for parent
User cancels force check of record
1 Fetch next/previous invoice number
Errors Only:
2 Perform validation on fetched invoice
3 If error is gone refetch (return to 1)
else check found row
If there are still errors the row is selected, else we fetch a new row (loop)

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select cast(count (*) as decimal (9,0)) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVERROR='Y' and SCHI_INVDELETED ='N' for fetch only
Select cast(count (*) as decimal (9,0)) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_CHECKINVOICE='Y' and SCHI_INVDELETED ='N' for fetch only

Text.val: -- TINT_AMOUNTC_INVOICES = sum (SCHI_INVAMOUNTC)
-- CLAC_NEW_INVOICES_DEBT = Sum (SCHI_INVAMOUNTC)
-- CLAC_NEW_INVOICES_CRED = Sum (SCHI_INVAMOUNTC)
-- CLAC_NEW_INVOICES = TINT_AMOUNTC_INVOICES
-- TINT_AMOUNTC_MARKCODES = sum (SCHI_INVAMOUNTC)
-- CLAC_NEW_INVOICES_MC = TINT_AMOUNTC_MARKCODES

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (SCHI_INVAMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' and :3
